attributes.action: Do not fell trees  just because  you want to install wind farms in that area
attributes.additional_details:
Please prevent and prohibit  Wind farm operators from   Felling trees  on the sites of new proposed wind farms.

That  runs   counter  to the objective of protecting the environment.

Trees are an essential  element in the ecology of the planet.
Will the government please amend the guidelines  in the Planning regulations concerning Wind Farms  to prohibit trees being felled  in any planned wind farm construction?
